QuestData.Title: The Rescue of Meredy Huntswell
QuestData.Description:
Our expedition's mage, Meredy Huntswell, is being held by the harpies!
We've got to stop their ritual and rescue Meredy.
You lead the charge. Kee-La and I will back you up if things look dire.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue Meredy Huntswell from the harpy's necromantic ritual.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Meredy Huntswell at the Harpy Roost entrance.
QuestData.RewardText: Ye rescued me from a grim fate! Bein' a practicin' mage, I always figured one of me own spells would do me in, not a harpy!
